verbs.description: [ARG0: rajon rondo family member] [V: confronted] [ARG1: chris paul wife] [ARGM-TMP: after brawl] the beef between rajon rondo and chris paul apparently got even more personal after their actual physical altercation on saturday night the two veteran point guards traded a number of punches during the houston rockets’ 124 - 115 win over the los angeles lakers at staples center following a fourth - quarter incident where rondo allegedly spit at paul the incident led to both players along with brandon ingram who also threw punches being staples center los angeles lakers family shams charania houston chronicle chris paul rajon rondo jada jonathan feigen houston rockets brandon ingram
